entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Amos
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.4°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
